sentences.sContent: computer hardware that quickly became obsolete
sentences.sCn: 很快就变得过时的电脑硬件

sentences.sContent: Will computers render (= make ) books obsolete?
sentences.sCn: 计算机会把书籍淘汰掉吗？

remMethod.val: ob(不) + solete(使用) → 不再使用 → 过时的

words.tran: 荒废的；即将过时的；逐渐被废弃的

trans.tranCn: 荒废的； 陈旧的， 过时的
trans.tranOther: no longer useful, because something newer and better has been invented
